channel.title: Asmuth the Slayer Model Contest #6 Winner
channel.description:
[b][size=12pt]Asmuth the Slayer[/size][/b] Hope you like. I can easily say this is the most I have ever worked on a project. Concept for a 7th barrows brother that I finally finished.
[img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/342/avroackthebutcherer.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/416/asmuth1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/5147/asmuthbs.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/498/asmuthwf.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/9492/asmuthdocinfo.jpg[/img]
Thanks for looking at it. Aaaand. The download link. http://www.mediafire.com/?4fe4b7z5f935fcs It isn't animated.

item.title: Asmuth the Slayer Model Contest #6 Winner
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

jaloko:

Its just gunth with stuff moved around. sure you did some new things to it, but its still gunth concept bro. if that were the case i liked the pk armor posted in there better.

No, “bro”. Actually download it and look at the wireframe, as well as the original Guthan’s. Huge difference.
Also refer to image posted above ^

Read full topic
item.source: Asmuth the Slayer Model Contest #6 Winner

item.title: Asmuth the Slayer Model Contest #6 Winner
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:


Guthans_equipped.png529×1037

Compare. Only thing similar is the helmet. And the helmet doesn’t have the flaps on the back like mine. And my structure is different. Also wireframes are completely different. The platebody and platelegs have almost 0 similarity. And that pk armor is just a recolor. Which goes against the rules.

Read full topic

Next one will be a fully modeled, animated, and scened NPC. We wan’t a 2 minuite long animation, you will be given 3 days to complete this. Goodluck!

I was aware it was 1…? Guys?

item.title: Asmuth the Slayer Model Contest #6 Winner
item.dc:creator: @Qazz Qazz
item.description:
@Qazz wrote:

dylan_0789:

To be honest, although only three people entered, you would have won anyway. It seems most Mopar modelers cant grasp the concept of manipulation well enough to complete an armor set. I guess this means that next contest will be even worse.

We’ll see…

Read full topic

item.title: Asmuth the Slayer Model Contest #6 Winner
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Maybe instead of jumping straight into another competition you more experienced modelers should start releasing simple, but effective videos/tutorials on manipulating primitives, modelling around a character. And the likes. I feel a video with a short explanation of what you are doing would be most effective.

Read full topic

item.title: Asmuth the Slayer Model Contest #6 Winner
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Nah, its deserved. It had a lot of effort put into it, and even if there were more entries, you still would’ve won unless one of the judges entered Hell, half the reason I didn’t enter was because I felt my model was too shitty to enter, that and the fact I really didn’t have much time to work on it.
